data.name: MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA - Mario Playable Character
data.detailed_description:
[About the contents]
Purchasing this item will add Mario as a playable character and the "Actions in the Lower World" selectable stage in MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA.

Mario Downloadable Content set contents
① Mario Playable Character
② Mario story
③ "Actions in the Lower World" stage
④ Mario network avatar, custom icon, plate, title, and gallery item

[About the contents]

data.short_description: This will add “Additional Character - Mario” to MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680 / Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display Resolution 1280x720 and above recommended.
